text: [Year 1279 AN][Shadow Realm Research Center]
Death Pepper: Scien!
Scien: Yes?
Death Pepper: Has the second protype awakened it's Xuir Arts yet?
Scien: Not yet, sir.
Death Pepper: Then it's likely another failure.
Death Pepper: Prepare the new extraction room, I might as well get somelife energy from this.
Death Pepper: And who knows, the torture might awaken one of it's arts.
Scien: Sir...
Scien: Sir... I will not.
Death Pepper: You dare defy my orders?
Scien: I've worked at this research center for the past seven years,but I can no longer handle this suffering.
Scien: I will likely die, but atleast this will reduce the sufferingof others.
Death Pepper: ...
Death Pepper: I've suspected that you'd betray me.
Death Pepper: Don't think that I haven't noticed that the ForbiddenRitual you had given was fake.
Scien: You attempted the Forbidden Ritual of Nation!?
Death Pepper: The only reason you're still alive is because of yourof your efficiency, though it seems that you'll no longercooperate with us.
Death Pepper: It's a shame that I'll have to kill you now, the onlyother person that could replace you is Break, and let's say that I'mnot his biggest fan.
Scien: ...
Scien: It's been eight painful years since you destroyed my town forthe Forbidden Ritual...
Scien: For these eight years, I've lacked the courage to stop thepain, to not continue to work with you...
Scien: I should have done this earlier, but it is something I canno longer live with.
Scien: Though it will not make up for my past actions, I will doeverything I can to save even one soul from this place.
(Scien grabs a young child)
Death Pepper: What do you think you're doing!?
Scien: If he stays here, he will die in three days when theextraction finishes. With this, he will have a chance ofsurival.
(Scien activates a device)
Death Pepper: BREAK! DEACTIVATE THE DEVICE!
Break: The device seems to be malfunctioning...
Death Pepper: Wait, does that mean...
Death Pepper: You fool! There's no way you'll survive witha broken teleporter! Who knows where it'll take you.
Death Pepper: You'll probably starve in the middle of the ocean.
Scien: If so, I will accept that fate as punishment.
(The teleporter activates and Scien disappears with the child)
Death Pepper: They got away, what a waste of resources...
